intro.content:
*Welcome to the Crystal Kingdom*

In a realm where magic flows through ancient crystals, darkness has begun to spread. As a chosen hero, you must embark on a quest to save the kingdom.

_Choose your starting class:_

story.content:
*Welcome to the Crystal Kingdom*

In a realm where magic flows through ancient crystals, darkness has begun to spread. As a chosen hero, you must embark on a quest to save the kingdom.

_Choose your starting class:_

character_created.content:
You stand at the entrance of Crystal City, its once-brilliant towers now dulled by the spreading darkness. A guard approaches you with urgency.

'Thank goodness you've arrived! The city needs your help. The central crystal has been corrupted, and monsters roam the streets.'

choices.text: Head directly to the Central Plaza
